column4: good day every body,how can an app be uinstalled with removing it's package in var/cache/archive ?
the package in the cache remains by defaule, you have to purge it or clear the cache for it to go.
in synaptic there is 2 choice remove anda remove completely what is the diffrenece ?
remove completely will purge its config files and remove it from the package cache as well as uninstalling it.
